title: Platform Testing Standard Metadata Schema
description: Validation schema for test metadata as defined in Platform Testing Standard v1.0

oracle.description: Primary oracle mechanism for pass/fail determination

invariants.description: Properties that must always hold during test execution

fixtures.description: Stable setup/teardown components used for determinism

shape.description: Domain summary of input data shape

notes.description: Additional notes about inputs, masks, or special considerations

risks.description: Potential risks or failure modes this test addresses

dependencies.description: External dependencies required for test execution

evidence.description: Types of evidence produced by test execution

compliance_refs.description: References to compliance standards validated by this test

ai_generated.description: Whether this test was authored by AI

human_reviewed_by.description: Name or group of human reviewer (required when ai_generated=true)
